title: Practical Implementation of Automated Business Intelligence Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical analysis, data preprocessing concepts, and experience with Python or RapidMiner
context.additional_context: Combines smartphone-based mobile learning with offline workshops. Emphasizes practical application-focused case studies

learning_goals: Learners can build a business intelligence model using AutoML tools within three stages (data loading - preprocessing - model generation).
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of AutoML approaches based on RapidMiner and Python, and explain criteria for selecting tools suited to actual work scenarios.
Learners can achieve a prediction accuracy of over 80% by applying a Random Forest regression model to datasets similar to the Airbnb case study.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
